entry.title: The Sorcerer Who Was Her
entry.summary:
Author: SChryslerS

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,517Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 449

Summary: The great and wise sorcerer, the closest confidant and most trusted ally of King Arthur, was born a girl. This single truth changes nothing—his wisdom remains boundless, his power undiminished, his destiny unshaken. And yet, it changes everything, for within this paradox lies a secret, a force beyond mere magic, one that reshapes not only his own fate but the fate of the world itself.

entry.title: The Fragility of Innocence
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,474Chapters: 7/27Kudos: 50

Summary: Merlin, the crown prince of Camelot, is renowned for his beauty and grace but lives a sheltered life under the watchful eye of his father, King Balinor, who views him as fragile. Unaware of the world beyond the castle walls, Merlin’s life changes when the brave knight Arthur enters the picture, showing him the depth of love and teaching him to find his own voice.Together, they must face the trials that come their way.

entry.title: love me like you used to (and i’ll praise you like i should)
entry.summary:
Author: moonlit_author

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,488Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 14

Summary: Five years ago, Merlin was exiled from Camelot under Crown Prince Arthur’s orders. His friend, his destiny. And secretly, Merlin could admit that Arthur would probably be the only man he’d ever love.One year ago, Arthur became King after his father passed due to an unknown illness. He governs his people alone and bears it as best as he can. After all, it is what he deserves after that day, five years ago.But attacks have become rampant ever since he took the throne. A mysterious group of sorcerers marked with a similar showing a full moon have started to appear and become notorious. Merlin and Arthur will come to meet again to, once again, save Camelot.—In other words. I’m dramatic. They pine and fight together with their friends by their side. Aren’t you glad it isn’t that complicated?

entry.title: A Sorcerer Stone
entry.summary:
Author: homebody_bird

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,716Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 50

Summary: “A rock?” Arthur stared skeptically at the map laid out in front of him.“Yes, sire… well, a stone.” The stableboy nodded nervously, glancing at the King before adding, “That is what they was saying. A stone that can’t be tricked nor fooled, one that can detect even the smallest bit of magic in a person.”* * * * * * * * * *Or I really liked the idea of a stone that identifies magic and how strong it is from 'A Warlock's Wish' by vividpast and couldn't stop thinking about it.

entry.title: The Saviour Complex
entry.summary:
Author: Charm2999

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 312,957Chapters: 50/?Kudos: 556

Summary: Harry receives a request for help that he can’t possibly turn down.In an effort to try and help others he makes a friend that will turn his world upside down but not before Harry does the same in return.——Merlin had given up on living a long long time ago. As the centuries had dragged on he had lost his loved ones time and time and time again. So he makes an impossible decision and choses to leave the world behind and live in solitude until Arthur’s return.His goal: To never suffer the loss of a loved one again.But even he couldn’t have guessed what fate had in store for him.

entry.title: Beyond The Lake
entry.summary:
Author: AuroraAthena

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,261Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Did Merlin mean to sneak away from work?Yes. Yes, he did.Did Merlin mean to cast a spell that summoned a great flood?Eh, kind of. Look, Gaius, just let him explain—Did Merlin mean to ride that wave straight through the fabric of time, landing a few hundred years in the future where all his friends are myths?Absolutely not.And did he mean to impose himself on a scholar who definitely thinks he’s, as she so kindly put it, “full crazy”?…Well, to be fair to him, she was the one who saved him, so…But hey, two out of four isn’t terrible. Right?Right???He’ll get back to Arthur.He has to.

entry.title: Where the heart lies
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,788Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 153

Summary: "You spend all your time thinking about what you can’t have," Gwaine continued, his tone dipping into something softer, something dangerously close to serious. "Maybe you should focus on what you can. You need a distraction."Merlin blinked at him, caught off guard. "And what exactly does that mean?"Slowly, a smirk curled at the edges of Gwaine’s lips."Well," he murmured, reaching out with an unexpected gentleness, "I think I can help with that."----------Merlin has secretly been in love with Arthur for years, convinced his feelings will never be returned. When Gwaine offers a distraction to help him move on, the unexpected closeness between them sparks jealousy in Arthur, leading him to realize he’s in love with Merlin too

entry.title: Forevermore
entry.summary:
Author: ChaosByDesign

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,494Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 47

Summary: “Only the once and future king,” Merlin would say, his voice a practised lilt "Can draw the sword from the stone.” It was a line he had repeated to countless tourists, their faces a mixture of scepticism and that stubborn, hopeful glint. Year after year, he scanned those faces, searching for the familiar flash of blue eyes, the proud set of the jaw, any sign of the man he had waited centuries for. He was an old soul, trapped in eternal limbo.

entry.title: When love blossoms
entry.summary:
Author: Trialbyname

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,000Chapters: 44/51Kudos: 300

Summary: "I command you again," Sir Leon let out, "Show yourselves!"Arthur rose first, his movements slow and careful. Merlin, after having gotten over the initial surprise, mirrored Arthurs movements, rising from his spot with both hands over his head. And he got to take in the ever so glorious sight of the four knights, looking between the two of them in pure confusion."I am truly sorry if we were a bother to you, sir knight." Arthur let out, a small tone of mockery in his voice."How-how is this...?" Gwaine let out, "How is this possible?"---Once upon a time, a choice was made. A choice that would have held consequences for the kingdom of Camelot, and everyone who lived there, had it gone through. But it didn't.But now, Merlin and Arthur find themselves in an alternate universe where it did.

entry.title: Lines in the Sand
entry.summary:
Author: PapySanzo

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,167Chapters: 9/25Kudos: 338

Summary: In the icy streets of Camelot City, a homeless Merlin struggles to survive after escaping an abusive relationship. When a chance encounter brings him face-to-face with Arthur Pendragon, the real estate billionaire owning half of Albion, Merlin is thrown a lifeline in the form of a job. But Pendragon’s offer is for sex work: a position as his 24/7 live-in sub. More than reluctant, but desperate for shelter, Merlin agrees, and soon finds himself struggling as past traumas resurface…

entry.title: remember who you are
entry.summary:
Author: excalibursflame

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,101Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: “What will the people think?” Agravine chidded. “You conspired with a sorcerer to kill your father. The kingdom would be destroyed upon hearing of your betrayal.”“What should I do?” Arthur asked, voice broken and lost.“Run away, Arthur. Run. Run away and never return.”

entry.title: Bringer of Light, Darkness, Magic, and All Things Inbetween
entry.summary:
Author: witerwallyanerd

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,890Chapters: 3/20Kudos: 10

Summary: My first fic guys! Say hello to god Merlin, sad Merlin, hurt Arthur, and really confused everyone else!-witerwallyanerdMerlin had been living a lie since he knew what one was. Ealdor lied in the border of Cenred’s kingdom and Camelot, and was much more tolerant of magic than Camelot was.Even so, you could only show so much ability before people got suspicious.So in Ealdor, it had always been playing down his abilities. He never imagined he was going to be hiding them completely. Merlin lived by Gaius’ rules, most of the time. Half the time. Whenever they didn’t get in his way, if he was being honest.However, recently, his magic had been itchy, for lack of better words. He felt it under his skin, in his veins, his hair. Heard it in every breath he breathed, every word that came from his mouth.
